response.overview: A bittersweet story about love, fate and coincidence. Mika, a 30 year-old journalist, is frustrated with her job and non-existent love life. After a car accident, her self-confidence has been shattered. She believes that life is just about luck, especially love life. She meets different people, but will her and her soulmate's paths eventually cross? Can Mika really influence her fate?
response.title: Mika
